taskBoard

Class OptionData

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskBoard.OptionData

  • public class OptionData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates an option instance to hold all the information of a single option.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • OptionData

        public OptionData(Prefix prefix,
                  java.lang.String keyWord,
                  Separator separator,
                  boolean dataValue,
                  Multiplicity multiplicity)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix, set from Option class
        keyWord - the key word of an option, set in the OptionSet class
        separator - the character that separates each argument, set in the OptionSet class
        dataValue - the boolean value indicating whether or not there is data item after key word, set in the OptionSet class
        multiplicity - the multiplicity of an option, set in the OptionSet class
